messages.title: Vote for me
messages.content: Vote for me, a strong and effective campaigner who will listen to residents and get things done for Croydon South.

messages.title: Why I'm backing Olga FitzRoy
messages.content: I will be voting for Olga because we need a strong and enthusiastic MP to stand up against a Tory Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Every aspect of a Tory government endangers our NHS. A Labour government will deliver a properly-funded NHS, and fair pay for our dedicated public sector workers. I will work with our local hospital to abolish the unfair parking charges.
Labour would give us back control over our railways. I fully support the Mayor of London's plans to bring Southern Rail under TfL control. We need a fast, clean and reliable public transport system.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour came second in Croydon South in 2017. The Lib Dems cannot win here.

issues.brexitEurope: I will never support a Brexit deal that threatens jobs or public services and I will campaign for remain in a referendum. Vote Labour for a final say.
issues.health: Every aspect of a Tory government endangers our NHS. A Labour government will deliver a properly-funded NHS, and fair pay for our dedicated public sector workers. I will work with our local hospital to abolish the unfair parking charges.
issues.transport: I often experience the misery of Southern Rail. Labour would give us back control over our railways. I fully support the Mayor of London's plans to bring Southern Rail under TfL control. We need a fast, clean and reliable public transport system. I will work with TfL to make sure Croydon South is not forgotten.

community.content: Encourage the council to ensure developments are appropriate.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm a self-employed sound engineer, a mother of one, and have a proven track record in campaigning. I led a successful campaign for self-employed parents to take shared parental leave, and I work with campaign group 'Pregnant Then Screwed' to protect mothers from maternity discrimination. I stand up for those in insecure work, and am leading a campaign against unpaid work. Vote for me to campaign for what matters to you.

endorsements.endorsement: I will be voting for Olga because we need a strong and enthusiastic MP to stand up against a Tory Brexit.
